Class BuildTrainingFacilityTask

Task extension that takes care of creating a training facility in the desired location

BuildTrainingFacilityTask(String type, int timeDif, int nationID, int sectorID)

Input Parameters

String type - Task type

int timeDif - Time until task code executes

int nationID - ID of the nation that owns the facility

int sectorID - ID of the sector where it's being built

Function List

getTaskBySectorID
static BuildTrainingFacilityTask getTaskBySectorID(int id, int nationID)

Global function that will return the DB instance of itself based on the passed sector ID and nation ID (if it exists)

Input Parameters

int id - Sector ID

int nationID - ID of the nation that owns the desired training facility

Output

The BuildTrainingFacilityTask if found in the database based on the passed conditions, otherwise returns null
runTaskCode
void runTaskCode()

Overriden from Task, contains the code that will execute after the specified amount of time from the constructor
